page.title: 16Petershill Football Club
page.content: Petershill Football Club was founded on Friday 4th June 1897.The team has won the Scottish Junior Cup five times.They share the record for winning the cup with Cambuslang Rangers.They almost won the Cup this year when they reached the final again.They played Pollock on Sunday 2nd June and it ended in a 1-1 draw. The teams played again at Hampden Park the following Tuesday and Pollock beat Petershill by three goals to one. Petershill won the Central League in the season of 1983-84 but they were unlucky this year. Petershill's best strikers are Andy Dailly and Pat Daly.They are both fast on their feet and excellent players. They have scored about 40 goals between them this season.Of course goals are not enough and goalkeeper Willie Harvey has played well,too.
